failsafe.passiveValidation.enabled.description: Enable passive validation of AI responses

failsafe.passiveValidation.mode.description: Validation mode: full (all rules), minimal (critical rules only), critical (essential rules only)

failsafe.passiveValidation.timeout.description: Maximum time (in milliseconds) to wait for validation before timing out

failsafe.passiveValidation.showFeedback.description: Show passive feedback when validation changes are applied

failsafe.passiveValidation.showFailureNo.description: Show notices when validation fails and manual verification is advised

failsafe.passiveValidation.enableRealTim.description: Enable real-time validation for immediate response processing

failsafe.passiveValidation.enableLogging.description: Enable detailed logging of validation activities

failsafe.passiveValidation.enableNotific.description: Show notifications for validation events (use sparingly to avoid spam)

failsafe.passiveValidation.enableAutoRet.description: Automatically retry validation on timeout or error

failsafe.passiveValidation.maxRetries.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed validations

failsafe.passiveValidation.enablePerform.description: Enable performance mode for faster validation (may reduce accuracy)

failsafe.passiveValidation.enableCustomR.description: Enable custom CursorRules in passive validation

failsafe.passiveValidation.enableChatVal.description: Enable chat-specific validation for hallucination detection

failsafe.passiveValidation.enableFileVal.description: Enable file existence and content validation

failsafe.passiveValidation.enableCodeVal.description: Enable code-specific validation for implementation claims

failsafe.passiveValidation.enableWorkflo.description: Enable workflow and process claim validation

failsafe.passiveValidation.enableBeginne.description: Enable beginner guidance validation and acknowledgment

failsafe.passiveValidation.enableStallin.description: Enable detection and removal of stalling language

failsafe.passiveValidation.enableVagueOf.description: Enable detection and improvement of vague offers

failsafe.passiveValidation.enableAbsolut.description: Enable detection of absolute statements needing qualifiers

failsafe.passiveValidation.enableImpleme.description: Enable detection of unverified implementation claims

failsafe.passiveValidation.enableTaskCom.description: Enable detection of unverified task completion claims

failsafe.passiveValidation.enableFileExi.description: Enable detection of unverified file existence claims

failsafe.passiveValidation.enablePerform.description: Enable detection of unverified performance claims

failsafe.passiveValidation.enableTestRes.description: Enable detection of unverified test result claims

failsafe.passiveValidation.enableCompila.description: Enable detection of unverified compilation status claims

failsafe.passiveValidation.enableAuditRe.description: Enable detection of unverified audit result claims

failsafe.passiveValidation.enableVersion.description: Enable detection of version management activities

failsafe.passiveValidation.enableAITaskE.description: Enable detection of AI task execution claims

failsafe.passiveValidation.enableGitHubW.description: Enable detection of GitHub workflow management

failsafe.passiveValidation.enableProduct.description: Enable detection of product discovery activities
